abstract: Nikolaos "Nikos" Spyropoulos (Greek: Νίκος Σπυρόπουλος; born 10 October 1983) is a Greek footballer currently playing as a defender or midfielder for PAOK in the Superleague Greece.
comment: Nikolaos "Nikos" Spyropoulos (Greek: Νίκος Σπυρόπουλος; born 10 October 1983) is a Greek footballer currently playing as a defender or midfielder for PAOK in the Superleague Greece.
